articles.description: Scotland beat Ireland by 1 wicket in the ICC World Cup Qualifiers 2023 thanks to a sensational unbeaten 61-ball 91 from Michael Leask.
articles.content:
Michael Leask punches the air after leading Scotland to a stunning win [Twitter]
